PatchouliAstronomyStudySe.Name: Astronomy Study
PatchouliAstronomyStudySe.Description: At the start of the Player's turn, if there are no <h>Astronomies</h> in the hand, add <Level /> <h>Astronomy</h> to the hand.

PatchouliAwakenedSpellbookSe.Name: Awakened Spellbook
PatchouliAwakenedSpellbookSe.Description:
Whenever a Boost card that has been Boosted or more times is played, Spellcast Fire Sign.
Whenever Spellcasts, Boost all the cards in the hand time$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} }) .

PatchouliCircadianRhythmSe.Name: Circadian Rhythm
PatchouliCircadianRhythmSe.Description: When 1 or more <h>Sun</h> or <h>Moon Sign Active</h> effects trigger, <h>Spellcast</h> that many <h>Signs</h> of the other time$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} }) <Level />.

PatchouliCounterSe.Name: Counter
PatchouliCounterSe.Description: If the target enemy intends to perform this action, activate the corresponding effect.

PatchouliCurrentConductorSe.Name: Current Conductor
PatchouliCurrentConductorSe.Description: Whenever <h>Water Sign</h> triggers, Apply or add <Level /> <h>Drowning</h> to each enemy and trigger <h>Drowning</h>.

PatchouliEarthSignSe.Name: Earth Sign
PatchouliEarthSignSe.Description:
Passive: Convert random mana into Philosopher's Mana.
Active: Convert random mana into Philosopher's Mana. Gain .

PatchouliFireSignSe.Name: Fire Sign
PatchouliFireSignSe.Description:
Passive: Deal damage to the enemy with the least life.
Active: Deal to the enemy with the least life. Gain .

PatchouliFiveSeasonsSe.Name: Five Seasons
PatchouliFiveSeasonsSe.Description: At the end of each turn, trigger the <h>Passive</h> effect of each <h>Sign</h> casting <Level /> time(s).

PatchouliGirlOfShadeSe.Name: Girl of Shade
PatchouliGirlOfShadeSe.Description: Whenever a <h>Status</h> or <h>Misfortune</h> card is <h>Exiled</h>, gain <Level /> <h>Firepower</h> and <h>Spirit</h>.

PatchouliGrandIncantationSe.Name: Grand Incantation
PatchouliGrandIncantationSe.Description: Whenever a <h>Boost</h> card is played, deal damage to the enemy with the most life equal to that card's <h>Boost</h> time$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} }) <Level />.

PatchouliIntelligenceSe.Name: Intelligence
PatchouliIntelligenceSe.Description: <h>Intelligence</h> increases the effectiveness of <h>Spellcasted Signs</h> by <Level />.

PatchouliKoakumaFriendSe.Name: Koakuma, Devilish Assistant
PatchouliKoakumaFriendSe.Description: <h>Fire Signs</h> deal damage <Level /> additional time$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} }) for the rest of combat.

PatchouliOneWeekGirlSe.Name: One-week Girl
PatchouliOneWeekGirlSe.Description:
At the start of each turn, Spellcast Sign, the Sign alternates every turn.
Next Sign: t(PatchouliOneWeekGirlSe.NextSign, { 'context': {{NextSign}} }) Sign

PatchouliPhlogisticPillarSe.Name: Phlogistic Pillar
PatchouliPhlogisticPillarSe.Description: Whenever a <h>Boost</h> card is played, gain <Level /> <h>Barrier</h>.

PatchouliSaintElmoPillarSe.Name: Saint Elmo's Pillar
PatchouliSaintElmoPillarSe.Description: Whenever <h>Reflection</h> triggers, deal damage to each enemy equal to the amount of <h>Reflection</h> time$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} }) <Level />.

PatchouliSatelliteHimawariSe.Name: Satellite Himawari
PatchouliSatelliteHimawariSe.Description:
Wood Sign's Passive effect apply to all Wood Sign for the rest of the combat instead.
Add damage to Wood Sign Active effect.

PatchouliSpellPowerGraspSe.Name: Spell Power Grasp
PatchouliSpellPowerGraspSe.Description: At the start of each turn, <h>Boost</h> all the cards in the hand <Level /> time(s).

PatchouliSunSignSe.Name: Sun Sign
PatchouliSunSignSe.Description:
Passive: Deal damage to each enemy.
Active: Deal to each enemy. Gain .

PatchouliTemporaryIntelligenceSe.Name: Temporary Intelligence
PatchouliTemporaryIntelligenceSe.Description:
Intelligence Increases until end of turn.
Intelligence increases the effectiveness of Signs by .

PatchouliTheUnmovingGreatLibrarySe.Name: The Unmoving Great Library
PatchouliTheUnmovingGreatLibrarySe.Description: Whenever a <h>Sign Active</h> effect triggers, gain <Level /> <h>Intelligence</h>.

PatchouliVoileSe.Name: Voile the Magic Library
PatchouliVoileSe.Description:
Whenever a Boost cards is played, apply the following effects based on its Boost:
: Draw cards.
: Gain .
: Gain Firepower.

PatchouliWoodSignSe.Name: Wood Sign
PatchouliWoodSignSe.Description:
Passive: Increase this Sign's Active damage by .
Active: Deal to the enemy with the most life. Gain .

AmuletForEnemy.Name: Bulwark
AmuletForEnemy.Description: Negate the next <Level /> non-Status cards that would be added (<h>Exile</h> them instead).

NextTurnLoseFire.Name: Next Turn Lose Firepower
NextTurnLoseFire.Description: At the start of <OwnerName />'s next turn, lose <Level /> <h>Firepower</h>.

NextTurnLosePower.Name: Next Turn Power Loss
NextTurnLosePower.Description: At the start of <OwnerName />'s next turn, lose <Level /> <Power />.

OmikujiBonusSe.Name: Spell Card Boost
OmikujiBonusSe.Description: <OwnerName /> deals <Level /> more damage when using her <h>Spell Card</h>.

SanaeBlockShuffleSe.Name: Divining Dance
SanaeBlockShuffleSe.Description: Whenever <OwnerName /> shuffles the draw pile, gain <Level /> <h>Block</h>.

SanaeDrawTempSe.Name: School Science Fair
SanaeDrawTempSe.Description: At the start of <OwnerName />'s turn, draw <Level /> cards and then discard any non-skill cards drawn this way.

SanaeExileDamageSe.Name: Trichromatic Edelweiss
SanaeExileDamageSe.Description: Whenever a status card or a card with <h>Auto-Exile</h> is <h>Exiled</h>, <OwnerName /> deals <Level /> damage to a random enemy.

SanaeKanakoFriendSe.Name: Evoked Deity
SanaeKanakoFriendSe.Description: Whenever the Spell Card is activated, <OwnerName /> gains <Level /> <h>Firepower</h> and <h>Graze</h>.

SanaeOrderShuffleSe.Name: Fragmental Insight
SanaeOrderShuffleSe.Description: Whenever a non-skill card is played, gain <Mana />. Then, the draw pile is shuffled.

SanaeSpellDamageSe.Name: Green Thaumaturgy
SanaeSpellDamageSe.Description: Whenever the Spell Card is activated, <OwnerName /> deals 8 attack damage to a random enemy <Level /> time$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} }).

SanaeSpellManaGreenSe.Name: Network Conspiracy
SanaeSpellManaGreenSe.Description: Whenever the Spell Card is activated, gain <Level /> <Mana />.

SanaeSpellManaPhiloSe.Name: Network Conspiracy
SanaeSpellManaPhiloSe.Description: Whenever the Spell Card is activated, gain <Level /> <Mana />.

SanaeSpiritManaSe.Name: Summoner Practice
SanaeSpiritManaSe.Description: At the start of <PlayerName />'s $t(ordinal, { 'context': {{Count}} }) turn$t(plurals.since, { 'count': {{Count}} }), gain <Level /> <h>Spirit</h> and add a <h>Radiance</h> to the hand.

SanaeStatusTalismanSe.Name: Paper Handicrafts
SanaeStatusTalismanSe.Description: At the end of <OwnerName />'s turn, add <h><Level /> Moriya Talisman$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} })</h> to the discard pile.

SanaeWardTalismanSe.Name: Prespoke Incantation
SanaeWardTalismanSe.Description: Whenever <OwnerName /> gains <h>Ward</h>, gain an equal amount of <Power />. Whenever the Spell Card is activated, add <Level /> <h>Moriya Talisman$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} })</h> to the discard pile.

TurnStartDontLoseMana.Name: Retain Mana
TurnStartDontLoseMana.Description: <OwnerName /> does not lose Mana at the start of the next $t(plurals.no, { 'count': {{Duration}} })turn$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Duration}} }).

CautionStatus.Name: CAUTION!
CautionStatus.Description: At the start of <PlayerName />'s turn, enter <h>Burst</h> and gain <h>Time Limit</h> <Mana1 />.

ChargingStatus.Name: Charging
ChargingStatus.Description: Gain <Level /> <h>Heat</h> at the end of each turn.

FixedStarStatus.Name: Fixed Star
FixedStarStatus.Description:
At the end of your turn, retain up to cards this turn.
All Dark Matter have Auto-Exile until end of combat.

GravityWellStatus.Name: Gravity Well
GravityWellStatus.Description: At the end of <PlayerName />'s turn, Gain <Level /> Barrier and add a <h>Dark Matter</h> to your hand.

HeatStatus.Name: Heat
HeatStatus.Description:
At the end of 's turn, lose 1 of every 5 Heat () and deal that much damage to all enemies.
The keyword Vent spends all of this at once for an effect.

HeatVisorStatus.Name: Heat Visor
HeatVisorStatus.Description: Prevent the next <Level /> times the player would lose life before your next turn.

HotSpringStatus.Name: Hot Spring
HotSpringStatus.Description: At the start of your turn, gain <Level /> <h>Radiation</h> and 1 <h>Hot Spring</h>.

MassDriverStatus.Name: Mass Driver
MassDriverStatus.Description: Whenever a card with <h>Mass</h> is Pulled, deal <Level /> damage to all enemies.

QuantumDissonanceStatus.Name: Quantum Dissonance
QuantumDissonanceStatus.Description: When the first <Level /> <h>Dark Matter</h> are played each turn, Scry 3.

RadiationStatus.Name: Radiation
RadiationStatus.Description: At the end of your turn, deal <Level /> damage to all enemies.

ResonancePlusStatus.Name: Resonance+
ResonancePlusStatus.Description: When you <h>Exile</h> a card, add a <h>Resonance+</h> to your hand.

ResonanceStatus.Name: Resonance
ResonanceStatus.Description: When you <h>Exile</h> a card, add a <h>Resonance</h> to your hand.

SunSpotStatus.Name: Sun Spot
SunSpotStatus.Description: When you play a <h>Dark Matter</h>, trigger your <h>Heat</h> <Level /> time$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} }).

TokamakStatus.Name: Hell's Tokamak
TokamakStatus.Description: At the start of your turn, gain <Level /> <h>Heat</h>.

TurboFuelStatus.Name: Turbo Fuel
TurboFuelStatus.Description:
At the start of your turn, gain and draw cards.
Then exile a random card in your hand.

WasteNotStatus.Name: Waste Not
WasteNotStatus.Description: When you exile a card, gain <Level /> <h>Heat</h>

YoumuAgelessObsessionSe.Name: Ageless Obsession
YoumuAgelessObsessionSe.Description: Whenever an enemy gains <h>Lock On</h>, apply <h>Lock On</h> <Level /> additional times.

YoumuAscensionToBuddhahoodSe.Name: Ascension To Buddhahood
YoumuAscensionToBuddhahoodSe.Description:
The first card$t(plurals.-s, { 'count': {{Level}} }) played each turn gains Echo.
(Remaining: )

YoumuBizarenessSe.Name: Bizarreness of Six Realms
YoumuBizarenessSe.Description: Whenever an enemy gains <h>Lock On</h>, also apply <Level /> <h>Poison</h>.

YoumuDivineSeveringSe.Name: Divine Severing
YoumuDivineSeveringSe.Description: Whenever <PlayerName /> <h>Unsheathes</h>, increase the damage of all Slash cards by <Level /> for the rest of combat.

YoumuDrawNextTurnSe.Name: Draw Next Turn
YoumuDrawNextTurnSe.Description: At the start of <PlayerName />'s next turn, draw <Level /> card(s).

YoumuDualWielderSe.Name: Dual-Wielder of Lives
YoumuDualWielderSe.Description: Whenever <PlayerName /> applies 5 <h>Lock On</h>, add <Level /> <h>Slash of Present</h> to the hand.

YoumuFlashOfTheNetherworldSe.Name: Flash Of The Netherworld
YoumuFlashOfTheNetherworldSe.Description: At the end of every extra turn, deal <Level /> Damage to each enemy for every card played that turn.

YoumuGreatEnlightenmentSe.Name: Great Enlightenment
YoumuGreatEnlightenmentSe.Description: At the start of <PlayerName />'s turn, <h>Unsheathe</h> <Level /> time(s).

YoumuInfiniteKalpasSe.Name: Infinite Kalpas
YoumuInfiniteKalpasSe.Description: At the start of <PlayerName />'s turn, add <Level /> random Youmu <h>Ethereal</h> card to the hand. These cards have <h>Exile</h>.

YoumuInnerEyeSe.Name: Inner Eye
YoumuInnerEyeSe.Description: Whenever a Slash card is played, gain <Level /> <h>Riposte</h>.

YoumuRiposteSe.Name: Riposte
YoumuRiposteSe.Description: Attack damage reduces <h>Riposte</h> instead of life. Deal damage to the attacker equal to the amount of <h>Riposte</h> lost.

YoumuSilentNirvanaSe.Name: Silent Nirvana
YoumuSilentNirvanaSe.Description: Whenever an enemy gains a debuff, gain <Level /> Block.

YoumuSpiritMediumBindSe.Name: Spirit Medium's Bind
YoumuSpiritMediumBindSe.Description: Whenever a card is <h>Exiled</h>, deal <Level /> damage toeach enemy.

YoumuUnendingWinterSe.Name: Unending Winter
YoumuUnendingWinterSe.Description: Whenever <PlayerName /> deals attack damage, apply <Level /> <h>Cold</h> to the target(s).

YoumuUnsheatheSe.Name: Unsheathe
YoumuUnsheatheSe.Description: This is a workaround to add keywords description to cards.

YoumuWatchtowerSwordSe.Name: Roukanken
YoumuWatchtowerSwordSe.Description: Whenever <PlayerName /> deals attack damage, also apply <Level /> <h>Lock On</h>.

YoumuWheelOfPainSe.Name: Wheel Of Pain
YoumuWheelOfPainSe.Description: At the start of <PlayerName />'s turn, apply <Level /> <h>Lock On</h> to each enemy.

YoumuYuyukoDeathSe.Name: Law of Mortality
YoumuYuyukoDeathSe.Description: This is a workaround to add keywords description to cards.

YoumuYuyukoFriendSe.Name: Border of life
YoumuYuyukoFriendSe.Description: At the end of <PlayerName />'s turn, apply <Level /> <h>Law of Mortality</h> to each enemy.
